CHANGES: ## 2026.01.25.63 - Initial Public Release. - Modern dashboard card with real-time RAM Saved chart. - Dynamic ZRAM swap management (Create/Remove) with persistence. - Support for all kernel-supported compression algorithms (zstd, lz4, etc.). - Safe Evacuation guards to prevent system crashes during ZRAM removal. - High-contrast dark theme UI optimized for Unraid 7.2+.
